general.name: getAppInfo
general.shortDesc: Returns the content of the 'info.xml' file of an app directory.

definition.desc: Returns, in the form of an array, the content of the file named "info.xml" contained in the configuration directory an application's directory.

params.name: app
params.desc: Name of the application to get the XML file from.

definition.return: If the file is read successfully, this function returns the content of the file transformed to a PHP array. Else, if the file can't be read, returns false.
